I’ve retrieved the bird, sir.

Covington, I’ll be sending these to Professor Henslow, so take good care

of them.

Yes sir!

Darwin collected many types of reptiles

on Maldonado. He also collected some

four-legged animals, 80 types of birds,

and 9 types of snakes.

Eeyaah!

Also, on the prairies he observed many varieties of birds, and recorded their types and attributes.

I’m not seeing stars, those are birds!

Ha ha!

Darwin gathered all of the samples and stuffed specimens from these observations and sent them to Professor Henslow.

Professor, I trust this

letter finds you well.

I am sending you some

collected

specimens.
